Jedna pametna aplikacija za sve tvoje kulinarske potrebe!

Uz bazu od preko 200.000 recepata, Coolinarika aplikacija pomaže ti lakše smisliti, bolje kuhati i finije jesti. Jednom kad te upozna, pamti što ti se sviđa, predlaže jela i recepte samo za tebe, pamti tvoje liste za kupovinu i još puno toga. Osim toga, zna koja jela su popularna i koje su namirnice u sezoni. Servira ti hrpu inspiracije - personalizirano i na jednom mjestu. Ti samo opleti po scrollu. Bilo da znaš točno što tražiš ili se samo želiš inspirirati, Coolinarika ima odgovor na sve.

Sve što imaš na Coolinarika webu, od sada možeš  besplatno koristiti i kroz aplikaciju na svom pametnom telefonu.

Isprobaj super korisne opcije Coolinarike:
• Okusni profil: ispuni kratak upitnik i kreiraj Okusni profil koji pamti sve tvoje kulinarske afinitete
• Inspiracija: istraži trendove, sezonalnosti, teme, jela i recepte na jednom mjestu
• Pametna tražilica: pretražuj po namirnicama, vremenu pripreme, vrsti jela, ključnim riječima
• Shopping liste: jednim klikom dodaj sve namirnice koje su ti potrebne za recept
• Kolekcije: ovdje spremi sve što ti se svidi i kreiraj svoju digitalnu kuharicu

Pretražuj bazu od preko 200.000 recepata
Od tradicionalnog bakinog recepta za grah do najnovijih kulinarskih trendova - Coolinarika ima sve i više od toga. Sadrži najveću bazu recepata u regiji, a kako bi se svatko mogao snaći u tom moru opcija, koristi napredne tražilice, filtere i personalizaciju sadržaja.

Pronađi preporuke po svom ukusu
Coolinarika postaje prava riznica uvijek novih trendova i personaliziranih preporuka. Ono što ti preporuča, preporučila je samo tebi! Usput ona vodi računa i o tome što je u trendu te koje je godišnje doba. Sladoled zimi je super, ali po zdravom razumu Coolinarike, veća je šansa da ćeš na takav recept naići u srpnju.

Pretražuj po receptu, jelu, namirnici, složenosti…
Ne znaš što bi s viškom tikvica koje imaš? Kuhaj prema onome što već postoji u hladnjaku. Tražiš jelo koje je spremno točno za 15 min kad ti dolaze gosti? Filtriraj jela prema složenosti pripreme. Ne znaš ni odakle krenuti? Prvo pretraži jela, a kad ti nešto zapne za gladne oči, pikni najbolji recept.

Kuhaj bez da išta zafali
Planiranje je pola posla. Zato je tu opcija shopping liste namirnica. Jednim klikom dodaj sve namirnice koje su ti potrebne za odabrani recept. Proširuj listu, križaj putem i lakše prati što ti se vrti po hladnjaku.

Izgradi Okusni profil prema svom apetitu
Odgovori na nekoliko jednostavnih pitanja kako bi ti Coolinarika mogla servirati personalizirani sadržaj. S vremenom ona uči što ti se sviđa, što često kuhaš, a što ti više nije zanimljivo i rado te časti finim preporukama.

Moderna aplikacija za KFC Hrvatska! Najlakši put za naručivanje hrane iz KFC-a. Aplikacija pamti vaše prethodne narudžbe te ih u samo nekoliko klikova možete jednostavno ponoviti kada god želite. Budite prvi koji će saznati za posebne promocije putem kupona. Kupone za popuste preuzmite iz aplikacije i pokažite na omiljenoj KFC lokaciji. Napomena za postojeće korisinike: Pozivamo vas da ažurirate KFC aplikaciju na novu verziju kako bi nastavili uživati u savršeno pripremljenoj piletini. 
Hvala na povjerenju! 

--------------- Pogodnosti -------------- 
* BRZO - U dva koraka se registrirajte (ime, prezime i e-mail) ili naručite omiljeni obrok bez registracije i uživajte u našim proizvodima uz brzu dostavu 
* ČUVA - Nakon prve registracije, vaši kontakt podaci će biti spremljeni i slijedeći put će sve biti jednostavnije
* ŠTEDI - Donesi posebne kupone u neki od KFC-ova i ostvari popust 
* LAKO - Naručivanje vaših omiljenih KFC proizvoda u samo nekoliko koraka 
* PREGLEDNO - KFC meni je podijeljen po kategorijama 
* PAMTI - Aplikacija pamti vaše prethodne narudžbe 
* JEDNOSTAVNO - Klikom na +/- možete povećati broj istog proizvoda u vašoj narudžbi 

------------------------------------------------- 

Zašto naručiti hranu iz KFC-a? 
* PRIPREMA SE PRIJE DOSTAVE Svakog dana naši kuhari ručno pripremaju piletinu po originalnim KFC receptima – zato svaki obrok ima tako savršen ukus. 
* PROVJERENA KVALITETA Meso se dostavlja u restorane isključivo od provjerenih proizvođača. Naš cilj je gostima servirati samo najbolje prirodne proizvode. 
* UVIJEK SVJEŽE Sigurni smo da ne postoji dobra hrana bez svježih sastojaka. Zbog toga se sastojci isporučuju u restorane nekoliko puta tjedno. Donesi kupon iz aplikacije i možeš ostvariti popust u svim KFC-ovima u Hrvatskoj: 
* KFC Arena 
* KFC Avenue mall 
* KFC Zapruđe 
* KFC City Center one West
* KFC City Center one East
* KFC City Center one Split
* KFC Črnomerec
* KFC Zadar

--------------- Napomene --------------- 
Za rad aplikacije neophodna je internet veza (mobilna veza ili WiFi) kako bi aplikacija uvijek preuzimala ažuriran cjenik i slala narudžbe u restoran. Odaberite svoju omiljenu kombinaciju, priloge i dodatke, naručite preko KFC Hrvatska aplikacije i dostava stiže na željenu adresu. Dostava hrane je dostupna na području Zagreba i Splita svakim danom od 16 - 23h. Nakon zaprimanja narudžbe, osoblje KFC-a će vas kontaktirati kako bi provjerili unesene podatke i sadržaj narudžbe. 

------------------------------------------------- 
Ukoliko vam je potrebna pomoć ili imate neku sugestiju, pošaljite nam e-mail na: mobile@ellecta.com 
* Molimo vas da ne ostavljate negativne ocjene ukoliko imate primjedbu na sadržaj ponude. Podatke o korisnicima KFC Hrvatska neće davati trećim stranama na uvid.

With 50 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Click to purchase your favourite bottles on-web or mobile 
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 50 million app downloads and climbing 
• 13 million wines and counting from 231,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 17 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app or Vivino.com via Vivino Checkout, a seamless two-click checkout experience. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Everything you need to know about introducing real food to babies with baby-led weaning or within a transition from spoon feeding to finger foods. 

Learn how to safely introduce more than 200 foods to baby. Each food has detailed nutrition information, choking & allergen guidance, specific instructions on how to cut and serve the food based on baby's age, videos of real babies eating the food, a unique recipe, and more. 

Better yet, every food's entry has been written and reviewed by a team of doctors, feeding specialists, swallowing specialists, and dietitians. Quickly search for a food (eggs, chicken, strawberries, anything!) and feel confident in exactly how to prepare it for baby.

With a paid subscription, you can record baby's progress with a digital food log, track baby's favorite foods, make a list of foods you'd like to try later, and track any foods baby has had a reaction to which you can share with doctors and caregivers.  

This app will be a crucial tool to help you to raise a healthy, happy eater, avoid picky eating, and enjoy family meals!

There is a new way to take the BeanBoozled Challenge. This app lets users play the game (remotely and in person), capture photos, find retailers and order online. 

BeanBoozled is a game of risk with two different challenging ways to play. Are you brave enough? 

The original BeanBoozled:  Ten delicious Jelly Belly jelly bean flavors (like Juicy Pear or Pomegranate) have been paired up with ten lookalikes in weird and wild flavors (like Booger or Old Bandage). Will it be Buttered Popcorn or Rotten Egg? Peach or Barf? There’s only one way to find out! 

The BeanBoozled Fiery Five Challenge asks how hot can you handle? Five progressively hot jelly beans range from smoldering Sriracha to scorching Carolina Reaper. Can you handle the heat?

What is the BeanBoozled App?
• Take the game anywhere! Take turns spinning the BeanBoozled wheel in the app to see what flavor you’ll have to try next.
• The app comes with a video sharing function so you can challenge your friends – wherever they are – in real time. You don’t need to physically be together to play BeanBoozled! Just use the built-in “Challenge A Friend” feature to play with your friend remotely. The app will send an invitation to your friend to play, and once they accept, you’re sharing the same spinner and playing the game together.
• Take photos while you play in the “Challenge A Friend” mode, or 6-second GIFs of the crazy faces your friends make. Add photo frames and share them to your social media channels.
• When you run out of a flavor, simply tell the app and the spinner will continue play without landing on what you’re missing.
• Need more BeanBoozled jelly beans? Search for a store near you with our built-in Store Locator, or use the option to buy online.
• Not sure what the jelly bean flavors are? Consult the handy flavor menu in the app for a helpful guide.

A Few Tips…
• DO have a trash can handy at all times. Trust us – you’ll need it.
• If you're playing BeanBoozled Fiery Five, have some milk, ice cream, rice or honey handy to extinguish the burn.
• DO NOT let wimps or crybabies play this game. (OK- maybe let them play after all. It can be fun to watch!)
• DO Make up your own rules. This is BeanBoozled where anything goes! Your imagination is your only limit.

Playing with your food has never been this much fun!
